About us

Started during the Covid lockdown period, we are awakening and we are hungry! Alta Luna is a new indierock band from Zeeland, The Netherlands. Inspired by the great bands of our youth - Arctic Monkeys, Blur, The War on Drugs - we're exploring sounds that we would love to let you hear. Fat drums, riffy guitars and big choruses mean it's always recognizable Alta Luna. You can listen to The Chain on your favorite streaming platform. So give us a listen and maybe tell your friends..?
